Items.Name: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee in SeaTac offers a unique experience with its Pandan latte and friendly atmosphere, especially appreciated by travelers at SEA airport's D20s gates. The place is highlighted for its flavorful food, quick service, and welcoming staff. Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine
Items.Description: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine in SeaTac offers a unique bubble tea experience within its vibrant atmosphere. While the main focus is on their extensive menu of Pan Asian dishes, the inclusion of bubble tea adds a refreshing touch to their offerings. The restaurant's vibe is welcoming, providing a cozy spot for enjoying a variety of flavors.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Cafe
Items.Description: Offering all your drink favorites, in addition to coffee flights, espresso cocktails, and a modern Filipino inspired brunch menu.

Items.Name: Happy Lemon - Tukwila
Items.Description: Happy Lemon is not just a bubble tea shop, it’s a lifestyle that incorporates generations of tea culture. We freshly brew and hand make every drink onsite. Striving to serve high premium quality and fresh teas to our customers all around the world.

Items.Name: Natalie’s Sugar Cane & Dessert
Items.Description: Natalie's Sugar Cane & Dessert in Tukwila delights with refreshing sugar cane drinks and unique Vietnamese desserts. Esteemed for real sugar cane boba and flavors like traditional sugarcane and passion fruit, it's a haven for authentic, sweet treats. Praised for its fresh, quality ingredients, Natalie's stands out for its genuine taste and variety​​.

Items.Name: Sharps Roasthouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6 PM Daily

Sharps RoastHouse has been voted one of the best restaurants in Seatac. We are a local restaurant and bar next door to Seatac Airport (Seattle International Airport), just outside of Seattle. We offer scratch American Cuisine, fine crafted cocktails and Northwest wine and beer. Our custom roasting works showcases our 12 hour Hereford Prime Rib, Applewood Smoked St Luis Ribs and spit fired organic rotisserie chicken. Perfect for a quick bite before a flight or layover or after picking up a hungry friend from a long day of traveling.

Items.Name: 13 Coins
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM Daily In The Lounge

During happy hour you can expect to get discounts on specialty cocktails  and select wines along with small bites like fried zucchini, brushcetta and our 13 coins sliders. Our diverse menu, featuring all-day breakfast, continental classics like Steak David and Clam Fettuccine, and signature dishes like Chicken Parmigiana, offers over 100 options to cater to every palate.

Items.Name: Reflections Bar & Grill
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3 - 6 PM Daily

Why not relax before getting down to business? Taste handcrafted local brews at Reflections Bar & Grill, a restaurant and bar located near the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. Start your business lunch by perusing the craft beer and wine menu in our spacious lounge, then savor delectable appetizers created by Chef Jonah McKay, including his famous Northwest Clam Chowder.

Items.Name: Claim Jumper Steakhouse & Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-9PM Sunday, 3PM-10PM Monday-Thursday, 3PM-7PM Friday & Saturday  

Premier Dining destination where indulgence meets comfort. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a night out with friends, or simply craving a delicious steak, Claim Jumper is the perfect choice.

Items.Name: Twin Peaks
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - Weekdays 3PM-6PM & 9PM-Close 

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various beers and select cocktails along with food such as wings, flatbread and loaded fries.Twin Peaks is so much more than your typical sports bar. Our lodge welcomes every guest with World Series walk offs and barrel-aged whiskey. The second you step inside, you’re surrounded by a lodge full of friendly and attentive Twin Peaks Girls serving up scratch food and our signature 29° beers.

Items.Name: The Cloud At Angle Lake Light Rail Station
Items.Description: This shimmering, glittering art installation at the light rail station marks the beginning or an end to any journey. Named “The Cloud” to represent a 3D cumulus cloud when viewed from a distance, this installation works with the sun and wind to create a destination that is uplifting to riders, pedestrians, and passersby.

Items.Name: Robert Morris Earthwork
Items.Description:
In 1979, the King County Arts Commission brought together a unique team of government agencies to create a historic work of public art, designed to rehabilitate land damaged by industry.
Artist Robert Morris removed undergrowth from an abandoned 3.7-acre gravel pit in the Kent Valley, terraced the earth, and planted it with rye grass. Morris returned the land to active use—40 years later, we value it as a gathering place and internationally-celebrated destination.

Items.Name: Big Catch Statue
Items.Description: The Big Catch statue is based upon a story of a beautiful maiden who was turned into a fish. After a kiss from the fisherman, she turns back into a maiden. The statue with a fisherman holding and kissing a voluptuous fish was a very controversial item when it was unveiled to the public. The statue was created by noted Seattle artist Richard Beyer.

Items.Name: Nike Missile Site At Grandview Dog Park
Items.Description:
With all the happy dogs frolicking around at this SeaTac park, you’d never know the location used to house a Cold
War-era missile defense system. In the late 1940s a defense system against incoming Soviet bombers included nearly a dozen Nike Missile sites in Washington state, this being one of them!

Items.Name: Maury Island Incident Mural
Items.Description: In 1947, just off the coast of Des Moines, UFOs appeared resulting in the first documented meeting with government agents – the original men in black. This mural depicts it all and leaves the viewer with a sense of awe and mystery.

Items.Name: Candice's Vietnamese Kitchen
Items.Description: This is a great Vietnamese spot that's serving up yummy eats, great coffee and has cute photo ops throughout their restaurant!

Items.Name: TeaCup
Items.Description: We proudly serve a range of ORGANIC teas, including Black Tea, Jasmine Green Tea, Green Tea, and Japanese Matcha, - All ORGANIC! We are the only Boba Tea Shop in the are which serves ORGANIC teas and we are the only business that serves our drinks with Cane Sugar, instead of using unhealthy high fructose corn syrups for sweeten.

Items.Name: Sharetea Des Moines
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee

Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: GOATEA
Items.Description: Bubble teas, fresh fruit smoothies, Vietnamese sandwiches, rice and more!

Items.Name: Arutro's Mexican Restaurant
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday

Arturo’s restaurant offers a fresh, healthy, appetizing food assortment that will leave you feeling like family. During happy hour you can enjoy meals for $9 such as our seven layer dip, chicken quesadilla, five tacos, and many more options.

Items.Name: All-Star Sports Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-6PM Daily

With 20 HDTVs, 14 beers on tap, burgers, pizza and plenty of appetizers, it’s the perfect sports bar for eating, drinking and watching the game. Enjoy pool tables, darts, ping pong, arcade games and more!

Items.Name: 13 Coins
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM Daily In The Lounge

During happy hour you can expect to get discounts on specialty cocktails  and select wines along with small bites like fried zucchini, brushcetta and our 13 coins sliders. Items.Name: Red Robin
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday In The Bar

We've got special prices on food, drinks and special treats that'll dial up the happy on your entire crew. Happy Hour pricing is available in the bar area only at participating locations. You can expect to get $3 off select appetizers like preztel bits, fried pickles, mozzarella sticks, pizzas, and sweet treasts!

Items.Name: BobaLust Tea House
Items.Description: BobaLust is a bubble tea spot blending strong tea flavors and SoCal boba style with warm hospitality. It values simplicity, sincerity, and focuses on quality with advanced tea brewing, chewy honey boba, and an inviting atmosphere featuring open concrete and vibrant vibes. It's a community-centric destination prioritizing fresh, flavorful tea experiences.

Items.Name: Sharetea Plus Tukwila
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: 85C Bakery Cafe - Tukwila (Southcenter Mall)
Items.Description: 85 C Bakery Café is renowned for its diverse selection of freshly baked goods, exquisite coffee, and teas. Known for blending traditional baking with modern flavors, it offers a quality café experience.

Items.Name: Peekaboo Fresh Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Enjoy our expertly crafted blends and welcoming atmosphere for a memorable sip of joy. Experience the magic of Peekaboo, where every drink is a moment of pleasure.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Name: Buffalo Wild Wings
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  $3-6 From 3PM-6PM Daily

Drinks for one or bites to share — wind down your work day with happy hour at Buffalo Wild Wings. You can expect to see discounts on select cocktails and beers along with food like tater tots, chips & salsa, mozzarella sticks, everything pretzel knots and much more!

Items.Name: Rendition
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.

Items.Name: JOEY Southcenter
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2PM - 5PM Daily And 9PM To Close Sunday - Thursday

During happy hour you can expect to enjouy discounted beer and cocktails along with small bites like Korean Fried Cauliflower or a Crispy Tofu Bowl. "Instead of just one chef, we have a whole team of celebrated Executive Chefs bringing you an experience you can’t get anywhere else. We believe in handcrafted, locally and globally inspired menu offerings".

Items.Description: Spice Bridge is home to FIN’s Food Business Incubator program, which helps South King County women of color and immigrants start and grow thriving restaurant and catering businesses. Come experience foods from around the world at Spice Bridge.

Hotel: Country Inn and Suites by Radisson

Items.Name: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee in SeaTac offers a unique experience with its Pandan latte and friendly atmosphere, especially appreciated by travelers at SEA airport's D20s gates. The place is highlighted for its flavorful food, quick service, and welcoming staff. Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine
Items.Description: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine in SeaTac offers a unique bubble tea experience within its vibrant atmosphere. While the main focus is on their extensive menu of Pan Asian dishes, the inclusion of bubble tea adds a refreshing touch to their offerings. The restaurant's vibe is welcoming, providing a cozy spot for enjoying a variety of flavors.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Cafe
Items.Description: Offering all your drink favorites, in addition to coffee flights, espresso cocktails, and a modern Filipino inspired brunch menu.

Items.Name: Happy Lemon - Tukwila
Items.Description: Happy Lemon is not just a bubble tea shop, it’s a lifestyle that incorporates generations of tea culture. We freshly brew and hand make every drink onsite. Striving to serve high premium quality and fresh teas to our customers all around the world.

Items.Name: Natalie’s Sugar Cane & Dessert
Items.Description: Natalie's Sugar Cane & Dessert in Tukwila delights with refreshing sugar cane drinks and unique Vietnamese desserts. Esteemed for real sugar cane boba and flavors like traditional sugarcane and passion fruit, it's a haven for authentic, sweet treats. Praised for its fresh, quality ingredients, Natalie's stands out for its genuine taste and variety​​.

Items.Name: Sharps Roasthouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6 PM Daily

Sharps RoastHouse has been voted one of the best restaurants in Seatac. We are a local restaurant and bar next door to Seatac Airport (Seattle International Airport), just outside of Seattle. We offer scratch American Cuisine, fine crafted cocktails and Northwest wine and beer. Our custom roasting works showcases our 12 hour Hereford Prime Rib, Applewood Smoked St Luis Ribs and spit fired organic rotisserie chicken. Perfect for a quick bite before a flight or layover or after picking up a hungry friend from a long day of traveling.

Items.Name: 13 Coins
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM Daily In The Lounge

During happy hour you can expect to get discounts on specialty cocktails  and select wines along with small bites like fried zucchini, brushcetta and our 13 coins sliders. Our diverse menu, featuring all-day breakfast, continental classics like Steak David and Clam Fettuccine, and signature dishes like Chicken Parmigiana, offers over 100 options to cater to every palate.

Items.Name: Reflections Bar & Grill
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3 - 6 PM Daily

Why not relax before getting down to business? Taste handcrafted local brews at Reflections Bar & Grill, a restaurant and bar located near the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. Start your business lunch by perusing the craft beer and wine menu in our spacious lounge, then savor delectable appetizers created by Chef Jonah McKay, including his famous Northwest Clam Chowder.

Items.Name: Claim Jumper Steakhouse & Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-9PM Sunday, 3PM-10PM Monday-Thursday, 3PM-7PM Friday & Saturday  

Premier Dining destination where indulgence meets comfort. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a night out with friends, or simply craving a delicious steak, Claim Jumper is the perfect choice.

Items.Name: Twin Peaks
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - Weekdays 3PM-6PM & 9PM-Close 

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various beers and select cocktails along with food such as wings, flatbread and loaded fries.Twin Peaks is so much more than your typical sports bar. Our lodge welcomes every guest with World Series walk offs and barrel-aged whiskey. The second you step inside, you’re surrounded by a lodge full of friendly and attentive Twin Peaks Girls serving up scratch food and our signature 29° beers.

Items.Description: BobaLust is a bubble tea spot blending strong tea flavors and SoCal boba style with warm hospitality. It values simplicity, sincerity, and focuses on quality with advanced tea brewing, chewy honey boba, and an inviting atmosphere featuring open concrete and vibrant vibes. It's a community-centric destination prioritizing fresh, flavorful tea experiences.

Items.Name: Peekaboo Fresh Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Enjoy our expertly crafted blends and welcoming atmosphere for a memorable sip of joy. Experience the magic of Peekaboo, where every drink is a moment of pleasure.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Name: 85C Bakery Cafe - Tukwila (Southcenter Mall)
Items.Description: 85 C Bakery Café is renowned for its diverse selection of freshly baked goods, exquisite coffee, and teas. Known for blending traditional baking with modern flavors, it offers a quality café experience.

Items.Name: Rendition
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: Buffalo Wild Wings
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  $3-6 From 3PM-6PM Daily

Drinks for one or bites to share — wind down your work day with happy hour at Buffalo Wild Wings. You can expect to see discounts on select cocktails and beers along with food like tater tots, chips & salsa, mozzarella sticks, everything pretzel knots and much more!

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice

Whether you're in the mood for something sweet, tart, or refreshingly unique, Big Orange offers a delightful bubble tea experience that caters to every palate.

Items.Name: Din Tai Fung
Items.Description: Aside from their soup dumplings and noodles you can additionally sip on their amazing bubble tea!

Items.Description:
Happy Hour- 3PM - 5PM Daily

Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4:00PM - 6:00PM Mon - Fri

During happy hour you can expect discounts on appetizers like our Roadside Sliders, Fried Calamari, and drinks like Mojitos, Margaritas and much more! During regular hours you can choose from more than 250 dishes made fresh from scratch every day and more than 40 legendary cheesecakes and desserts.

Items.Name: Trapper Sushi Co.
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2-6PM Daily

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various sushi longs rolls, and all you can eat menu items. We also offer discounts on specialty cocktails! If you’re looking for a chill sushi experience, Trapper’s Tukwila offers a variety of traditional and unconventional sushi rolls, a full bar with signature cocktails, and special menus for gluten-free, vegetarians, vegans, and kids.

Items.Name: Dukes Seafood Restaurant
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM To Close Daily

Duke's Seafood in Southcenter, located in Tukwila at the south end of The Westfield Mall, is an upscale casual Pacific Northweset seafood restaurant offering signature, flavorful, 100% sustainable wild seafood, Award Winning Chowder, and grass-fed burgers in a gathering place that is friendly, comfortable, unpretentious, and filled with personality. We only source all-natural, healthful ingredients. Duke's food is free of hormones, antibiotics, and free of harmful chemicals. Guests sum up their favorable assessment of what Duke's has to offer with three words: It’s so good! Great Fish Tacos, Wild Halibut & Salmon, Salads and amazing sandwiches. 

At Duke’s, we are not interested in compromising quality in any way; we have relentlessly developed incredible sources that provide amazing quality. Almost all of the seafood we feature here at Duke’s comes from the Northwest and Alaska. We thank you for coming in and I personally want to welcome you to our restaurant. I think you will find that we care deeply about the food we serve and the enjoyment of our guests.

The place is highlighted for its flavorful food, quick service, and welcoming staff. Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine
Items.Description: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine in SeaTac offers a unique bubble tea experience within its vibrant atmosphere. While the main focus is on their extensive menu of Pan Asian dishes, the inclusion of bubble tea adds a refreshing touch to their offerings. The restaurant's vibe is welcoming, providing a cozy spot for enjoying a variety of flavors.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Cafe
Items.Description: Offering all your drink favorites, in addition to coffee flights, espresso cocktails, and a modern Filipino inspired brunch menu.

Items.Name: Happy Lemon - Tukwila
Items.Description: Happy Lemon is not just a bubble tea shop, it’s a lifestyle that incorporates generations of tea culture. We freshly brew and hand make every drink onsite. Striving to serve high premium quality and fresh teas to our customers all around the world.

Items.Name: Natalie’s Sugar Cane & Dessert
Items.Description: Natalie's Sugar Cane & Dessert in Tukwila delights with refreshing sugar cane drinks and unique Vietnamese desserts. Esteemed for real sugar cane boba and flavors like traditional sugarcane and passion fruit, it's a haven for authentic, sweet treats. Praised for its fresh, quality ingredients, Natalie's stands out for its genuine taste and variety​​.

Items.Name: Sharps Roasthouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6 PM Daily

Sharps RoastHouse has been voted one of the best restaurants in Seatac. We are a local restaurant and bar next door to Seatac Airport (Seattle International Airport), just outside of Seattle. We offer scratch American Cuisine, fine crafted cocktails and Northwest wine and beer. Our custom roasting works showcases our 12 hour Hereford Prime Rib, Applewood Smoked St Luis Ribs and spit fired organic rotisserie chicken. Perfect for a quick bite before a flight or layover or after picking up a hungry friend from a long day of traveling.

Items.Name: 13 Coins
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM Daily In The Lounge

During happy hour you can expect to get discounts on specialty cocktails  and select wines along with small bites like fried zucchini, brushcetta and our 13 coins sliders. Our diverse menu, featuring all-day breakfast, continental classics like Steak David and Clam Fettuccine, and signature dishes like Chicken Parmigiana, offers over 100 options to cater to every palate.

Items.Name: Reflections Bar & Grill
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3 - 6 PM Daily

Why not relax before getting down to business? Taste handcrafted local brews at Reflections Bar & Grill, a restaurant and bar located near the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. Start your business lunch by perusing the craft beer and wine menu in our spacious lounge, then savor delectable appetizers created by Chef Jonah McKay, including his famous Northwest Clam Chowder.

Items.Name: Claim Jumper Steakhouse & Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-9PM Sunday, 3PM-10PM Monday-Thursday, 3PM-7PM Friday & Saturday  

Premier Dining destination where indulgence meets comfort. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a night out with friends, or simply craving a delicious steak, Claim Jumper is the perfect choice.

Items.Name: Twin Peaks
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - Weekdays 3PM-6PM & 9PM-Close 

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various beers and select cocktails along with food such as wings, flatbread and loaded fries.Twin Peaks is so much more than your typical sports bar. Our lodge welcomes every guest with World Series walk offs and barrel-aged whiskey. The second you step inside, you’re surrounded by a lodge full of friendly and attentive Twin Peaks Girls serving up scratch food and our signature 29° beers.

Items.Name: Big Catch Statue
Items.Description: The Big Catch statue is based upon a story of a beautiful maiden who was turned into a fish. After a kiss from the fisherman, she turns back into a maiden. The statue with a fisherman holding and kissing a voluptuous fish was a very controversial item when it was unveiled to the public. The statue was created by noted Seattle artist Richard Beyer.

Items.Name: Sharetea Plus Tukwila
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: Kung Fu Tea
Items.Description: Kung Fu Tea crafts each drink with genuine Kung Fu, utilizing a unique brewing process for fresh, high-quality beverages. Tea is brewed every 3 hours, and bubbles are refreshed every 2, ensuring freshness. Bestsellers like Orange Green Tea and Strawberry Lemonade feature freshly squeezed juices, with real tea leaves from Taiwan's high mountains, highlighting our commitment to unmatched quality amid growing competition.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Name: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice
Items.Description: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice excels in authentic Taiwanese bubble tea, praised for its perfect pearl texture and flavor variety. Notable for friendly service and a quick-stop vibe, it's a preferred choice for boba lovers

Items.Name: Peekaboo Fresh Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Enjoy our expertly crafted blends and welcoming atmosphere for a memorable sip of joy. Experience the magic of Peekaboo, where every drink is a moment of pleasure.

Items.Name: Rendition
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: JOEY Southcenter
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2PM - 5PM Daily And 9PM To Close Sunday - Thursday

During happy hour you can expect to enjouy discounted beer and cocktails along with small bites like Korean Fried Cauliflower or a Crispy Tofu Bowl. "Instead of just one chef, we have a whole team of celebrated Executive Chefs bringing you an experience you can’t get anywhere else. We believe in handcrafted, locally and globally inspired menu offerings".

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

The hospitality and authentic flavors of Mexico are behind everything we do at Moctezuma’s. Our efforts have not gone unnoticed, earning accolades from South Sound Magazine in 2014, 2015, 2016 & 2017 including “Best Mexican Restaurant”, and noted for our “inviting atmosphere and friendly staff.”
Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.
Moctezuma’s Mexican Restaurant & Tequila Bar is Puget Sound’s premiere dining destination for quality Mexican cuisine. The flavors and aromas truly come alive at our restaurants, with only the freshest ingredients selected for our guests.
The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

Items.Name: Dukes Seafood Restaurant
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM To Close Daily

Duke's Seafood in Southcenter, located in Tukwila at the south end of The Westfield Mall, is an upscale casual Pacific Northweset seafood restaurant offering signature, flavorful, 100% sustainable wild seafood, Award Winning Chowder, and grass-fed burgers in a gathering place that is friendly, comfortable, unpretentious, and filled with personality. We only source all-natural, healthful ingredients. Duke's food is free of hormones, antibiotics, and free of harmful chemicals. Guests sum up their favorable assessment of what Duke's has to offer with three words: It’s so good! Great Fish Tacos, Wild Halibut & Salmon, Salads and amazing sandwiches. 

At Duke’s, we are not interested in compromising quality in any way; we have relentlessly developed incredible sources that provide amazing quality. Almost all of the seafood we feature here at Duke’s comes from the Northwest and Alaska. We thank you for coming in and I personally want to welcome you to our restaurant. I think you will find that we care deeply about the food we serve and the enjoyment of our guests.

Braganza uses fresh boba, loose leaf teas, homemade syrups with organic sugar, and scratch-made recipes. Inspired by Catherine of Braganza, who introduced tea to the New World, they embody a commitment to quality and tradition in every cup.

Billy's full service bar features 20 rotating beers on tap featuring a number of local breweries. Enjoy one of our signature cocktails or a glass of wine while enjoying the game or just a night out with friends. Our flexible space can accommodate larger groups as well inside or on our spacious patio that overlooks the golf course. Come and enjoy!

The statue with a fisherman holding and kissing a voluptuous fish was a very controversial item when it was unveiled to the public. The statue was created by noted Seattle artist Richard Beyer.

Items.Name: Nike Missile Site At Grandview Dog Park
Items.Description:
With all the happy dogs frolicking around at this SeaTac park, you’d never know the location used to house a Cold
War-era missile defense system. In the late 1940s a defense system against incoming Soviet bombers included nearly a dozen Nike Missile sites in Washington state, this being one of them!

Items.Name: Maury Island Incident Mural
Items.Description: In 1947, just off the coast of Des Moines, UFOs appeared resulting in the first documented meeting with government agents – the original men in black. This mural depicts it all and leaves the viewer with a sense of awe and mystery.

Hotel: Four Points by Sheraton Seattle Airport South

Items.Name: Sharetea Des Moines
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: GOATEA
Items.Description: Bubble teas, fresh fruit smoothies, Vietnamese sandwiches, rice and more!

Items.Name: Candice's Vietnamese Kitchen
Items.Description: This is a great Vietnamese spot that's serving up yummy eats, great coffee and has cute photo ops throughout their restaurant!

Items.Name: TeaCup
Items.Description: We proudly serve a range of ORGANIC teas, including Black Tea, Jasmine Green Tea, Green Tea, and Japanese Matcha, - All ORGANIC! We are the only Boba Tea Shop in the are which serves ORGANIC teas and we are the only business that serves our drinks with Cane Sugar, instead of using unhealthy high fructose corn syrups for sweeten.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee in SeaTac offers a unique experience with its Pandan latte and friendly atmosphere, especially appreciated by travelers at SEA airport's D20s gates. The place is highlighted for its flavorful food, quick service, and welcoming staff. Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: Arutro's Mexican Restaurant
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday

Arturo’s restaurant offers a fresh, healthy, appetizing food assortment that will leave you feeling like family. During happy hour you can enjoy meals for $9 such as our seven layer dip, chicken quesadilla, five tacos, and many more options.

Items.Name: All-Star Sports Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-6PM Daily

With 20 HDTVs, 14 beers on tap, burgers, pizza and plenty of appetizers, it’s the perfect sports bar for eating, drinking and watching the game. Enjoy pool tables, darts, ping pong, arcade games and more!

Items.Name: Red Robin
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday In The Bar

We've got special prices on food, drinks and special treats that'll dial up the happy on your entire crew. Happy Hour pricing is available in the bar area only at participating locations. You can expect to get $3 off select appetizers like preztel bits, fried pickles, mozzarella sticks, pizzas, and sweet treasts!

Items.Name: Anthony's HomePort
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00PM-6:30PM Monday-Friday 

Enjoy a truly Northwest dining experience while overlooking the Des Moines Marina, Olympic Mountains, and Maury Island!  Anthony's owns our own seafood company for the sole purpose of ensuring our guests only the highest quality Northwest seafood. Complementing our seafood, Anthony’s family-owned restaurants offer fresh seasonal produce from local farms, local microbrews and Northwest wines, enhanced with a backdrop of spectacular waterfront views.

Items.Name: Viva Mexico
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  4-7PM Daily With Daily Dinner Specials.

Authentic Mexican food and killer Margaritas located in Des Moines, WA! Full dinner menu and cocktail menu available for takeout, with daily walk-in specials!

Items.Name: Nike Missile Site At Grandview Dog Park
Items.Description:
With all the happy dogs frolicking around at this SeaTac park, you’d never know the location used to house a Cold
War-era missile defense system. In the late 1940s a defense system against incoming Soviet bombers included nearly a dozen Nike Missile sites in Washington state, this being one of them!

Items.Name: Zenith Holland Nursery
Items.Description: The oldest continually operating business in Des Moines has grown and sold high quality plants to locals and visitors since 1907. This nursery has witnessed and survived 2 world wars, a depression, a pandemic and so much more.

The place is highlighted for its flavorful food, quick service, and welcoming staff. Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine
Items.Description: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine in SeaTac offers a unique bubble tea experience within its vibrant atmosphere. While the main focus is on their extensive menu of Pan Asian dishes, the inclusion of bubble tea adds a refreshing touch to their offerings. The restaurant's vibe is welcoming, providing a cozy spot for enjoying a variety of flavors.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Cafe
Items.Description: Offering all your drink favorites, in addition to coffee flights, espresso cocktails, and a modern Filipino inspired brunch menu.

Items.Name: Happy Lemon - Tukwila
Items.Description: Happy Lemon is not just a bubble tea shop, it’s a lifestyle that incorporates generations of tea culture. We freshly brew and hand make every drink onsite. Striving to serve high premium quality and fresh teas to our customers all around the world.

Items.Name: Natalie’s Sugar Cane & Dessert
Items.Description: Natalie's Sugar Cane & Dessert in Tukwila delights with refreshing sugar cane drinks and unique Vietnamese desserts. Esteemed for real sugar cane boba and flavors like traditional sugarcane and passion fruit, it's a haven for authentic, sweet treats. Praised for its fresh, quality ingredients, Natalie's stands out for its genuine taste and variety​​.

Items.Name: Sharps Roasthouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6 PM Daily

Sharps RoastHouse has been voted one of the best restaurants in Seatac. We are a local restaurant and bar next door to Seatac Airport (Seattle International Airport), just outside of Seattle. We offer scratch American Cuisine, fine crafted cocktails and Northwest wine and beer. Our custom roasting works showcases our 12 hour Hereford Prime Rib, Applewood Smoked St Luis Ribs and spit fired organic rotisserie chicken. Perfect for a quick bite before a flight or layover or after picking up a hungry friend from a long day of traveling.

Items.Name: 13 Coins
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM Daily In The Lounge

During happy hour you can expect to get discounts on specialty cocktails  and select wines along with small bites like fried zucchini, brushcetta and our 13 coins sliders. Our diverse menu, featuring all-day breakfast, continental classics like Steak David and Clam Fettuccine, and signature dishes like Chicken Parmigiana, offers over 100 options to cater to every palate.

Items.Name: Reflections Bar & Grill
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3 - 6 PM Daily

Why not relax before getting down to business? Taste handcrafted local brews at Reflections Bar & Grill, a restaurant and bar located near the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. Start your business lunch by perusing the craft beer and wine menu in our spacious lounge, then savor delectable appetizers created by Chef Jonah McKay, including his famous Northwest Clam Chowder.

Items.Name: Claim Jumper Steakhouse & Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-9PM Sunday, 3PM-10PM Monday-Thursday, 3PM-7PM Friday & Saturday  

Premier Dining destination where indulgence meets comfort. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a night out with friends, or simply craving a delicious steak, Claim Jumper is the perfect choice.

Items.Name: Twin Peaks
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - Weekdays 3PM-6PM & 9PM-Close 

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various beers and select cocktails along with food such as wings, flatbread and loaded fries.Twin Peaks is so much more than your typical sports bar. Our lodge welcomes every guest with World Series walk offs and barrel-aged whiskey. The second you step inside, you’re surrounded by a lodge full of friendly and attentive Twin Peaks Girls serving up scratch food and our signature 29° beers.

Items.Name: The Cloud At Angle Lake Light Rail Station
Items.Description: This shimmering, glittering art installation at the light rail station marks the beginning or an end to any journey. Named “The Cloud” to represent a 3D cumulus cloud when viewed from a distance, this installation works with the sun and wind to create a destination that is uplifting to riders, pedestrians, and passersby.

Items.Name: BobaLust Tea House
Items.Description: BobaLust is a bubble tea spot blending strong tea flavors and SoCal boba style with warm hospitality. It values simplicity, sincerity, and focuses on quality with advanced tea brewing, chewy honey boba, and an inviting atmosphere featuring open concrete and vibrant vibes. It's a community-centric destination prioritizing fresh, flavorful tea experiences.

Items.Name: Sharetea Plus Tukwila
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: 85C Bakery Cafe - Tukwila (Southcenter Mall)
Items.Description: 85 C Bakery Café is renowned for its diverse selection of freshly baked goods, exquisite coffee, and teas. Known for blending traditional baking with modern flavors, it offers a quality café experience.

Items.Name: Peekaboo Fresh Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Enjoy our expertly crafted blends and welcoming atmosphere for a memorable sip of joy. Experience the magic of Peekaboo, where every drink is a moment of pleasure.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Name: Rendition
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: Buffalo Wild Wings
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  $3-6 From 3PM-6PM Daily

Drinks for one or bites to share — wind down your work day with happy hour at Buffalo Wild Wings. You can expect to see discounts on select cocktails and beers along with food like tater tots, chips & salsa, mozzarella sticks, everything pretzel knots and much more!

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

The hospitality and authentic flavors of Mexico are behind everything we do at Moctezuma’s. Our efforts have not gone unnoticed, earning accolades from South Sound Magazine in 2014, 2015, 2016 & 2017 including “Best Mexican Restaurant”, and noted for our “inviting atmosphere and friendly staff.”
Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.
Moctezuma’s Mexican Restaurant & Tequila Bar is Puget Sound’s premiere dining destination for quality Mexican cuisine. The flavors and aromas truly come alive at our restaurants, with only the freshest ingredients selected for our guests.
The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

Items.Name: JOEY Southcenter
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2PM - 5PM Daily And 9PM To Close Sunday - Thursday

During happy hour you can expect to enjouy discounted beer and cocktails along with small bites like Korean Fried Cauliflower or a Crispy Tofu Bowl. "Instead of just one chef, we have a whole team of celebrated Executive Chefs bringing you an experience you can’t get anywhere else. We believe in handcrafted, locally and globally inspired menu offerings".

Items.Name: Spice Bridge International Food Hall
Items.Description: Spice Bridge is home to FIN’s Food Business Incubator program, which helps South King County women of color and immigrants start and grow thriving restaurant and catering businesses. Come experience foods from around the world at Spice Bridge.

Items.Name: Duwamish Gardens
Items.Description: This important piece of land that represents the history of the Coast Salish people, pioneering truck farmers, and Italian immigrants now serves as a reminder of the past and an important salmon restoration habitat.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Description:

Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

The hospitality and authentic flavors of Mexico are behind everything we do at Moctezuma’s. Our efforts have not gone unnoticed, earning accolades from South Sound Magazine in 2014, 2015, 2016 & 2017 including “Best Mexican Restaurant”, and noted for our “inviting atmosphere and friendly staff.”
Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.
Moctezuma’s Mexican Restaurant & Tequila Bar is Puget Sound’s premiere dining destination for quality Mexican cuisine. The flavors and aromas truly come alive at our restaurants, with only the freshest ingredients selected for our guests.
The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

Famous Dave's pit-smoked BBQ has won over 1,000 awards across the country! "Famous" Dave Anderson spent 25 years crafting the most craveable ribs, chopped pork, beef brisket, and chicken recipes in America. Treat your guests to America's favorite BBQ, with sustainably sourced meats smoked in-house, alongside of classic sides, our famous corn bread muffin, and homestyle desserts. Our Cabin seats 55 comfortably and is perfect for celebrations, fantasy drafts, business meetings, graduations, weddings, parties, neighborhood get-togethers, and more! You can enjoy Famous Dave's SLAB-tastic BBQ in the dining room, bar, semi-private room, or dine al fresco outside on the patio. If you prefer to take it to-go, you can order over the phone or through the website. Come join us at Famous Dave's: America's favorite BBQ! Or we can come to you with full-service catering and delivery.

It's a community-centric destination prioritizing fresh, flavorful tea experiences.

Items.Name: Sharetea Plus Tukwila
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Description: 85 C Bakery Café is renowned for its diverse selection of freshly baked goods, exquisite coffee, and teas. Known for blending traditional baking with modern flavors, it offers a quality café experience.

Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: Buffalo Wild Wings
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  $3-6 From 3PM-6PM Daily

Drinks for one or bites to share — wind down your work day with happy hour at Buffalo Wild Wings. You can expect to see discounts on select cocktails and beers along with food like tater tots, chips & salsa, mozzarella sticks, everything pretzel knots and much more!

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

The hospitality and authentic flavors of Mexico are behind everything we do at Moctezuma’s. Our efforts have not gone unnoticed, earning accolades from South Sound Magazine in 2014, 2015, 2016 & 2017 including “Best Mexican Restaurant”, and noted for our “inviting atmosphere and friendly staff.”
Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.
Moctezuma’s Mexican Restaurant & Tequila Bar is Puget Sound’s premiere dining destination for quality Mexican cuisine. The flavors and aromas truly come alive at our restaurants, with only the freshest ingredients selected for our guests.
The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

Items.Name: JOEY Southcenter
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2PM - 5PM Daily And 9PM To Close Sunday - Thursday

We believe in handcrafted, locally and globally inspired menu offerings".

Premier Dining destination where indulgence meets comfort. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a night out with friends, or simply craving a delicious steak, Claim Jumper is the perfect choice.

Items.Name: Twin Peaks
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - Weekdays 3PM-6PM & 9PM-Close 

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various beers and select cocktails along with food such as wings, flatbread and loaded fries.Twin Peaks is so much more than your typical sports bar. Our lodge welcomes every guest with World Series walk offs and barrel-aged whiskey. The second you step inside, you’re surrounded by a lodge full of friendly and attentive Twin Peaks Girls serving up scratch food and our signature 29° beers.

Items.Name: The Cloud At Angle Lake Light Rail Station
Items.Description: This shimmering, glittering art installation at the light rail station marks the beginning or an end to any journey. Named “The Cloud” to represent a 3D cumulus cloud when viewed from a distance, this installation works with the sun and wind to create a destination that is uplifting to riders, pedestrians, and passersby.

Items.Name: Robert Morris Earthwork
Items.Description:
In 1979, the King County Arts Commission brought together a unique team of government agencies to create a historic work of public art, designed to rehabilitate land damaged by industry.
Artist Robert Morris removed undergrowth from an abandoned 3.7-acre gravel pit in the Kent Valley, terraced the earth, and planted it with rye grass. Morris returned the land to active use—40 years later, we value it as a gathering place and internationally-celebrated destination.

Items.Name: Big Catch Statue
Items.Description: The Big Catch statue is based upon a story of a beautiful maiden who was turned into a fish. After a kiss from the fisherman, she turns back into a maiden. The statue with a fisherman holding and kissing a voluptuous fish was a very controversial item when it was unveiled to the public. The statue was created by noted Seattle artist Richard Beyer.

Items.Name: Nike Missile Site At Grandview Dog Park
Items.Description:
With all the happy dogs frolicking around at this SeaTac park, you’d never know the location used to house a Cold
War-era missile defense system. In the late 1940s a defense system against incoming Soviet bombers included nearly a dozen Nike Missile sites in Washington state, this being one of them!

Items.Name: Maury Island Incident Mural
Items.Description: In 1947, just off the coast of Des Moines, UFOs appeared resulting in the first documented meeting with government agents – the original men in black. This mural depicts it all and leaves the viewer with a sense of awe and mystery.

Hotel: Residence Inn by Marriott Seattle South/Tukwila

Items.Name: Sharetea Plus Tukwila
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: BobaLust Tea House
Items.Description: BobaLust is a bubble tea spot blending strong tea flavors and SoCal boba style with warm hospitality. It values simplicity, sincerity, and focuses on quality with advanced tea brewing, chewy honey boba, and an inviting atmosphere featuring open concrete and vibrant vibes. It's a community-centric destination prioritizing fresh, flavorful tea experiences.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Name: Peekaboo Fresh Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Enjoy our expertly crafted blends and welcoming atmosphere for a memorable sip of joy. Experience the magic of Peekaboo, where every drink is a moment of pleasure.

Items.Name: 85C Bakery Cafe - Tukwila (Southcenter Mall)
Items.Description: 85 C Bakery Café is renowned for its diverse selection of freshly baked goods, exquisite coffee, and teas. Known for blending traditional baking with modern flavors, it offers a quality café experience.

Items.Name: Rendition
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: Buffalo Wild Wings
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  $3-6 From 3PM-6PM Daily

Drinks for one or bites to share — wind down your work day with happy hour at Buffalo Wild Wings. You can expect to see discounts on select cocktails and beers along with food like tater tots, chips & salsa, mozzarella sticks, everything pretzel knots and much more!

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: JOEY Southcenter
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2PM - 5PM Daily And 9PM To Close Sunday - Thursday

During happy hour you can expect to enjouy discounted beer and cocktails along with small bites like Korean Fried Cauliflower or a Crispy Tofu Bowl. "Instead of just one chef, we have a whole team of celebrated Executive Chefs bringing you an experience you can’t get anywhere else. We believe in handcrafted, locally and globally inspired menu offerings".

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

The hospitality and authentic flavors of Mexico are behind everything we do at Moctezuma’s. Our efforts have not gone unnoticed, earning accolades from South Sound Magazine in 2014, 2015, 2016 & 2017 including “Best Mexican Restaurant”, and noted for our “inviting atmosphere and friendly staff.”
Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.
Moctezuma’s Mexican Restaurant & Tequila Bar is Puget Sound’s premiere dining destination for quality Mexican cuisine. The flavors and aromas truly come alive at our restaurants, with only the freshest ingredients selected for our guests.
The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

Items.Name: Spice Bridge International Food Hall
Items.Description: Spice Bridge is home to FIN’s Food Business Incubator program, which helps South King County women of color and immigrants start and grow thriving restaurant and catering businesses. Come experience foods from around the world at Spice Bridge.

Items.Name: The Cloud At Angle Lake Light Rail Station
Items.Description: This shimmering, glittering art installation at the light rail station marks the beginning or an end to any journey. Named “The Cloud” to represent a 3D cumulus cloud when viewed from a distance, this installation works with the sun and wind to create a destination that is uplifting to riders, pedestrians, and passersby.

Items.Name: Duwamish Gardens
Items.Description: This important piece of land that represents the history of the Coast Salish people, pioneering truck farmers, and Italian immigrants now serves as a reminder of the past and an important salmon restoration habitat.

Items.Description:

Items.Name: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Neighborhood Bubble Tea & Coffee in SeaTac offers a unique experience with its Pandan latte and friendly atmosphere, especially appreciated by travelers at SEA airport's D20s gates. The place is highlighted for its flavorful food, quick service, and welcoming staff. Open daily from 6AM to 5PM, it provides a cozy spot for both bubble tea lovers and coffee enthusiasts seeking quality and comfort​​.

Items.Name: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine
Items.Description: Ginger Palace Pan Asian Cuisine in SeaTac offers a unique bubble tea experience within its vibrant atmosphere. While the main focus is on their extensive menu of Pan Asian dishes, the inclusion of bubble tea adds a refreshing touch to their offerings. The restaurant's vibe is welcoming, providing a cozy spot for enjoying a variety of flavors.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Cafe
Items.Description: Offering all your drink favorites, in addition to coffee flights, espresso cocktails, and a modern Filipino inspired brunch menu.

Items.Name: Happy Lemon - Tukwila
Items.Description: Happy Lemon is not just a bubble tea shop, it’s a lifestyle that incorporates generations of tea culture. We freshly brew and hand make every drink onsite. Striving to serve high premium quality and fresh teas to our customers all around the world.

Items.Name: Natalie’s Sugar Cane & Dessert
Items.Description: Natalie's Sugar Cane & Dessert in Tukwila delights with refreshing sugar cane drinks and unique Vietnamese desserts. Esteemed for real sugar cane boba and flavors like traditional sugarcane and passion fruit, it's a haven for authentic, sweet treats. Praised for its fresh, quality ingredients, Natalie's stands out for its genuine taste and variety​​.

Items.Name: Reflections Bar & Grill
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3 - 6 PM Daily

Why not relax before getting down to business? Taste handcrafted local brews at Reflections Bar & Grill, a restaurant and bar located near the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. Start your business lunch by perusing the craft beer and wine menu in our spacious lounge, then savor delectable appetizers created by Chef Jonah McKay, including his famous Northwest Clam Chowder.

Items.Name: 13 Coins
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM Daily In The Lounge

During happy hour you can expect to get discounts on specialty cocktails  and select wines along with small bites like fried zucchini, brushcetta and our 13 coins sliders. Our diverse menu, featuring all-day breakfast, continental classics like Steak David and Clam Fettuccine, and signature dishes like Chicken Parmigiana, offers over 100 options to cater to every palate.

Items.Name: Sharps Roasthouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6 PM Daily

Sharps RoastHouse has been voted one of the best restaurants in Seatac. We are a local restaurant and bar next door to Seatac Airport (Seattle International Airport), just outside of Seattle. We offer scratch American Cuisine, fine crafted cocktails and Northwest wine and beer. Our custom roasting works showcases our 12 hour Hereford Prime Rib, Applewood Smoked St Luis Ribs and spit fired organic rotisserie chicken. Perfect for a quick bite before a flight or layover or after picking up a hungry friend from a long day of traveling.

Items.Name: Pier 88 Boiling Seafood
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 7PM Mon - Friday & All Day Sunday

Pier 88 Boiling Seafood & Bar is a casual, family-friendly restaurant specializing in Louisiana-style Cajun seafood, specialty cocktails, and the best happy hour.

Items.Name: Famous Daves
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday 

Famous Dave's pit-smoked BBQ has won over 1,000 awards across the country! "Famous" Dave Anderson spent 25 years crafting the most craveable ribs, chopped pork, beef brisket, and chicken recipes in America. Treat your guests to America's favorite BBQ, with sustainably sourced meats smoked in-house, alongside of classic sides, our famous corn bread muffin, and homestyle desserts. Our Cabin seats 55 comfortably and is perfect for celebrations, fantasy drafts, business meetings, graduations, weddings, parties, neighborhood get-togethers, and more! You can enjoy Famous Dave's SLAB-tastic BBQ in the dining room, bar, semi-private room, or dine al fresco outside on the patio. If you prefer to take it to-go, you can order over the phone or through the website. Come join us at Famous Dave's: America's favorite BBQ! Or we can come to you with full-service catering and delivery.

Items.Name: All-Star Sports Bar
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM-6PM Daily

With 20 HDTVs, 14 beers on tap, burgers, pizza and plenty of appetizers, it’s the perfect sports bar for eating, drinking and watching the game. Enjoy pool tables, darts, ping pong, arcade games and more!

Items.Name: Red Robin
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday In The Bar

We've got special prices on food, drinks and special treats that'll dial up the happy on your entire crew. Happy Hour pricing is available in the bar area only at participating locations. You can expect to get $3 off select appetizers like preztel bits, fried pickles, mozzarella sticks, pizzas, and sweet treasts!

Items.Name: Big Catch Statue
Items.Description: The Big Catch statue is based upon a story of a beautiful maiden who was turned into a fish. After a kiss from the fisherman, she turns back into a maiden. The statue with a fisherman holding and kissing a voluptuous fish was a very controversial item when it was unveiled to the public. The statue was created by noted Seattle artist Richard Beyer.

Items.Name: Nike Missile Site At Grandview Dog Park
Items.Description:
With all the happy dogs frolicking around at this SeaTac park, you’d never know the location used to house a Cold
War-era missile defense system. In the late 1940s a defense system against incoming Soviet bombers included nearly a dozen Nike Missile sites in Washington state, this being one of them!

Items.Name: Natalie’s Sugar Cane & Dessert
Items.Description: Natalie's Sugar Cane & Dessert in Tukwila delights with refreshing sugar cane drinks and unique Vietnamese desserts. Esteemed for real sugar cane boba and flavors like traditional sugarcane and passion fruit, it's a haven for authentic, sweet treats. Praised for its fresh, quality ingredients, Natalie's stands out for its genuine taste and variety​​.

Items.Name: Tea Time & Coffee
Items.Description: Tea Time & Coffee in Tukwila delights with a wide selection of bubble tea and coffee. Popular for its Salted Caramel Milk Tea and Flan Tiger Sugar, it offers a cozy vibe and friendly service. Open daily, it's a go-to for quality drinks and snacks​​.

Items.Name: Neighborhood Cafe
Items.Description: Offering all your drink favorites, in addition to coffee flights, espresso cocktails, and a modern Filipino inspired brunch menu.

Items.Name: Happy Lemon - Tukwila
Items.Description: Happy Lemon is not just a bubble tea shop, it’s a lifestyle that incorporates generations of tea culture. We freshly brew and hand make every drink onsite. Striving to serve high premium quality and fresh teas to our customers all around the world.

Items.Name: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice
Items.Description: CoCo Fresh Tea & Juice excels in authentic Taiwanese bubble tea, praised for its perfect pearl texture and flavor variety. Notable for friendly service and a quick-stop vibe, it's a preferred choice for boba lovers

Items.Name: Pier 88 Boiling Seafood
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 7PM Mon - Friday & All Day Sunday

Pier 88 Boiling Seafood & Bar is a casual, family-friendly restaurant specializing in Louisiana-style Cajun seafood, specialty cocktails, and the best happy hour.

Items.Name: Bai Tong Thai Restaurant
Items.Description:
Happy Hour- 3PM - 5PM Daily

Casual Thai restaurant offering a menu of curries, noodles & more in a funky, fashionable space.

Items.Name: Famous Daves
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3-6PM Monday-Friday 

Famous Dave's pit-smoked BBQ has won over 1,000 awards across the country! "Famous" Dave Anderson spent 25 years crafting the most craveable ribs, chopped pork, beef brisket, and chicken recipes in America. Treat your guests to America's favorite BBQ, with sustainably sourced meats smoked in-house, alongside of classic sides, our famous corn bread muffin, and homestyle desserts. Our Cabin seats 55 comfortably and is perfect for celebrations, fantasy drafts, business meetings, graduations, weddings, parties, neighborhood get-togethers, and more! You can enjoy Famous Dave's SLAB-tastic BBQ in the dining room, bar, semi-private room, or dine al fresco outside on the patio. If you prefer to take it to-go, you can order over the phone or through the website. Come join us at Famous Dave's: America's favorite BBQ! Or we can come to you with full-service catering and delivery.

Items.Name: The Cheesecake Factory Restaurant
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4:00PM - 6:00PM Mon - Fri

During happy hour you can expect discounts on appetizers like our Roadside Sliders, Fried Calamari, and drinks like Mojitos, Margaritas and much more! During regular hours you can choose from more than 250 dishes made fresh from scratch every day and more than 40 legendary cheesecakes and desserts.

Items.Name: Twin Peaks
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - Weekdays 3PM-6PM & 9PM-Close 

During happy hour you can expect discounts on various beers and select cocktails along with food such as wings, flatbread and loaded fries.Twin Peaks is so much more than your typical sports bar. Our lodge welcomes every guest with World Series walk offs and barrel-aged whiskey. The second you step inside, you’re surrounded by a lodge full of friendly and attentive Twin Peaks Girls serving up scratch food and our signature 29° beers.

Items.Name: Spice Bridge International Food Hall
Items.Description: Spice Bridge is home to FIN’s Food Business Incubator program, which helps South King County women of color and immigrants start and grow thriving restaurant and catering businesses. Come experience foods from around the world at Spice Bridge.

Items.Name: The Cloud At Angle Lake Light Rail Station
Items.Description: This shimmering, glittering art installation at the light rail station marks the beginning or an end to any journey. Named “The Cloud” to represent a 3D cumulus cloud when viewed from a distance, this installation works with the sun and wind to create a destination that is uplifting to riders, pedestrians, and passersby.

Items.Name: Robert Morris Earthwork
Items.Description:
In 1979, the King County Arts Commission brought together a unique team of government agencies to create a historic work of public art, designed to rehabilitate land damaged by industry.
Artist Robert Morris removed undergrowth from an abandoned 3.7-acre gravel pit in the Kent Valley, terraced the earth, and planted it with rye grass. Morris returned the land to active use—40 years later, we value it as a gathering place and internationally-celebrated destination.

Items.Name: Nike Missile Site At Grandview Dog Park
Items.Description:
With all the happy dogs frolicking around at this SeaTac park, you’d never know the location used to house a Cold
War-era missile defense system. In the late 1940s a defense system against incoming Soviet bombers included nearly a dozen Nike Missile sites in Washington state, this being one of them!

Items.Name: Duwamish Gardens
Items.Description: This important piece of land that represents the history of the Coast Salish people, pioneering truck farmers, and Italian immigrants now serves as a reminder of the past and an important salmon restoration habitat.

Items.Name: BobaLust Tea House
Items.Description: BobaLust is a bubble tea spot blending strong tea flavors and SoCal boba style with warm hospitality. It values simplicity, sincerity, and focuses on quality with advanced tea brewing, chewy honey boba, and an inviting atmosphere featuring open concrete and vibrant vibes. It's a community-centric destination prioritizing fresh, flavorful tea experiences.

Items.Name: Sharetea Plus Tukwila
Items.Description: At Sharetea, we have professional R&D team to create recipes with different ingredients to bring out the unique qualities of each tea. We focus greatly on quality and insist on providing authentic Taiwan high mountain tea to deliver great experiences.

Items.Name: Peekaboo Fresh Tea & Coffee
Items.Description: Peekaboo invites you to a delightful drink journey with a variety of milk teas, fresh milks, and fruit teas, complemented by our irresistible egg waffles. Enjoy our expertly crafted blends and welcoming atmosphere for a memorable sip of joy. Experience the magic of Peekaboo, where every drink is a moment of pleasure.

Items.Name: Boba Smoothies
Items.Description: Boba Smoothies is known for its great service and a variety of delicious drinks. They offer lactose-free smoothies and ice creams made with fresh ingredients, providing many options for treats. The taro smoothie with boba comes highly recommended. The shop's welcoming atmosphere and kind service make it a favorite among locals​​.

Items.Name: 85C Bakery Cafe - Tukwila (Southcenter Mall)
Items.Description: 85 C Bakery Café is renowned for its diverse selection of freshly baked goods, exquisite coffee, and teas. Known for blending traditional baking with modern flavors, it offers a quality café experience.

Items.Name: Rendition
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 4 - 10 PM Sunday & Monday & 4 - 6 PM Tuesday To Saturday

Rendition at Hotel Interurban provides a comfortable setting that accommodates any type of gathering. Whether you desire a family get together or a meal with business colleagues, this Tukwila restaurant serves up the ideal atmosphere. Enjoy casual fare, and a premium bar with seasonal craft cocktails and local and international wines and brews. Rendition is open seven days a week, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Items.Name: Buffalo Wild Wings
Items.Description:
Happy Hour -  $3-6 From 3PM-6PM Daily

Drinks for one or bites to share — wind down your work day with happy hour at Buffalo Wild Wings. You can expect to see discounts on select cocktails and beers along with food like tater tots, chips & salsa, mozzarella sticks, everything pretzel knots and much more!

Items.Name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3:00-7:00 PM Monday-Friday & 9:00 PM-Close Sunday-Thursday

You’ll love our Happy Hour specials like discounted beer and margaritas or our select appetizers like the mini deep dish pizza, and our patio is a great place to sit. Whether you’re looking for a place to eat a meal with the family, a spot to grab a beer and watch the game or a location for a bigger gathering, we’re here for you—and we’re open until midnight seven days a week! Come see for yourself why BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse is a Tukwila favorite.

Items.Name: Moctezuma's Cocina & Tequila
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 3PM - 6PM & 9PM - Close Daily

The hospitality and authentic flavors of Mexico are behind everything we do at Moctezuma’s. Our efforts have not gone unnoticed, earning accolades from South Sound Magazine in 2014, 2015, 2016 & 2017 including “Best Mexican Restaurant”, and noted for our “inviting atmosphere and friendly staff.”
Likewise, KING 5’s Evening Magazine recently recognized Moctezuma’s as “Best Mexican Restaurant” in their “Best of Western Washington” competition for 2014, 2015 and 2016.
Moctezuma’s Mexican Restaurant & Tequila Bar is Puget Sound’s premiere dining destination for quality Mexican cuisine. The flavors and aromas truly come alive at our restaurants, with only the freshest ingredients selected for our guests.
The menu has been carefully crafted with recipes both new and old, time-tested traditional favorites alongside exciting new selections. Each dish reflects the rich, authentic style our kitchen has become known for, served with a level of hospitality and ambiance that is simply unmatched.

Items.Name: JOEY Southcenter
Items.Description:
Happy Hour - 2PM - 5PM Daily And 9PM To Close Sunday - Thursday

During happy hour you can expect to enjouy discounted beer and cocktails along with small bites like Korean Fried Cauliflower or a Crispy Tofu Bowl. "Instead of just one chef, we have a whole team of celebrated Executive Chefs bringing you an experience you can’t get anywhere else. We believe in handcrafted, locally and globally inspired menu offerings".

Items.Name: Spice Bridge International Food Hall
Items.Description: Spice Bridge is home to FIN’s Food Business Incubator program, which helps South King County women of color and immigrants start and grow thriving restaurant and catering businesses. Come experience foods from around the world at Spice Bridge.
